seo.title: Publish one single tweet and win
seo.description: One of the biggest grand prizes on the whole crypto market. Post on Twitter what the CHO price will be on March 24, 2024 with hashtag #CHOpricePrediction and why you think so

main.title: Publish one single tweet and win

description.title: One of the biggest grand prizes on the whole crypto market
description.description: post what will the cho price be on march 24, 2024 using the #choprediction hashtag on twitter and don't forget to tell us why you think you'll be in the right

benefits.title: the 1st place gets $1,000,000, and $500,000 is divided among the other 999 winners.

gleam.title: participate in gleam. increase your chances of winning
gleam.description: If more than one participant’s prediction is correct, we will determine the winner on the back of his activity in Choise.com Gleam

information.item_description: is a trusted entry point to yield products that revolutionizes the way you earn.

array.sub_description: Buy, insure and hold your crypto and get up to 16% APY in stablecoins. CHO token stands at the heart of the ecosystem.

array.description:
CHO tokenomics
is set to reward all CHO holders by providing them with attractive APY, benefits for users and partners, discounts on fees and other bonuses that will be voted for in Choise.com DAO.

price_exchanges.title:
CHO price x3
since the ido date

array.title: How can I participate?
array.description: Just make a tweet with your price prediction for CHO token with the #CHOprediction hashtag and your opinion – will the price rise or fall and why.

array.title: Until what date can I make a tweet?
array.description: The prediction should be published no later than January 1st, 2024. All predictions published after this date are not accepted.

array.title: How should the token price be written?
array.description: The token price must be written with three digits after the decimal point. Example: $5,321

array.title: What will happen if more than one person makes the right prediction?
array.description: If more than one participant’s prediction is correct, we will determine the winner on the back of their activity in Choise.com Gleam

array.title: When will the winners be announced?
array.description: The list of winners will be published on the Choise.com social media on June 1st, 2024.

array.title: How can I receive my prize?
array.description: The winning token price will be posted on the Price Prediction Festival webpage together with the form so that the winners could provide Choise.com with their contact details (phone number, Choise.com App account, Gleam nickname) and a link to the tweet with their prediction.

array.title: How many attempts can I make?
array.description: Each person can make 1 attempt only. If someone makes two attempts, we’ll only count the first one.

array.title: Twitter account qualification
array.description: To be qualified for the contest your Twitter account should be created no earlier than 3 months before the publication of the Price Prediction tweet and have at least 50 followers.
